title: 2/bd, Elevator access, in Carson CA
neighborhood: 285 E Del Amo Blvd, Carson, CA
posting_body: ['Evolve South Bay is a place where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.', 'Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Carson, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with refined amenities in our new develpoment apartment homes.', 'Each one of our pet friendly apartment homes come fully equipped with energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.', '-Easy access to the 110, 405 and 710 freeways', '-Onsite playground', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', '-Polished quartz kitchen countertops', '-Elevator access', '-Private balcony or patio', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi and private offices Featured amenity', '-Two-story resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen Photo Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with cabanas Photo Featured amenity', '-Wood-style plank flooring Featured amenity', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Courtyard with recreational games available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
